author: SteveL-MSFT
body: We've seen a few cases where an engineer runs `start-pspester` and it passes but it breaks our nightly runs as the `Feature` tests weren't run.  We should change the default of `start-pspester` to run both CI and Feature tests and update our CI scripts to explicitly pass `-Tag CI`.
title: Start-PSPester should default to running CI and Feature tests
